document.description: Fast Food Restaurant: ... To view a list of all fast food items for a specific restaurant, select a fast food chain ...
document.body:
T he Zone Fast Food Finder lists the calories, carbohydrates, proteins and fat content of most food items served by popular fast food chains and restaurants. Items which best approach (within 5%) the 40% carbohydrates , 30% proteins and 30% fat ratio are automatically hilighted.
Zone Fast Food Finder Fast Food Restaurant: All Arby's Burger King Godfather's Pizza Jack in the Box KFC McDonald's Pizza Hut Subway Taco Bell Taco Time Wendy's Fast Food Item: To view a list of all fast food items for a specific restaurant, select a fast food chain from the pop-up menu above and then click the submit button below.
A re you in the 40-30-30 zone? Interested in balanced diet and nutrition programs? Share your experience by joining 40-30-30 Talk today.
Copyright©2000 Erik C. Thauvin . All Rights Reserved .
The information provided by the Zone Fast Food Finder is for educational purposes only and is not intended to replace the advice of healthcare professionals. Please consult your physician before making changes in your diet. The data listed in the Zone Fast Food Finder has been gathered from the nutrition information publicly made available by the fast food chains and restaurants listed above. We are not responsible for errors and omissions. All trademarks are the properties of their respective owners.
